name: open-webui-cortex-integration
description: Open WebUI + Cortex Memory Integration Proof of Concept

scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run build-sdk && npm run start:local
scripts.start:local: cd src/cortex-bridge && npm install && node server.js
scripts.start:docker: npm run setup && npm run sync-env && npm run build-sdk && docker-compose up -d cortex-bridge
scripts.dev: cd src/cortex-bridge && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run deploy
scripts.test:all: npm run test:basic && npm run test:multi-agent && npm run test:contexts && npm run test:facts && npm run test:gdpr
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run deploy

author: Saint Nick LLC
